meanings.sent1: The color of the pen was unimportant to me.
meanings.sent2: The unimportant details were easily forgotten.
meanings.sent3: She laughed at the unimportant mistake she made.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, his opinion was as unimportant as a grain of sand.
meanings.sent5: The unimportant task seemed to drag on forever.

meanings.sent1: The unimportant meeting was quickly rescheduled.
meanings.sent2: Her unimportant comment went unnoticed in the conversation.
meanings.sent3: He found humor in the unimportant argument they were having.
meanings.sent4: The unimportant decision felt like a weight lifted off his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The unimportant news didn't affect their plans at all.
